name: The Missing Piece (Consc)
description:
Developed by Costas, You Jin, Nicole and Analisse.

Childhood Fantasies follows the imaginations and fantasies of four children and their personas in a fantastical world where they need to escape the imaginary home they are placed in. To do this players need to cooperate with each other in this four person multiplayer game to solve puzzles and fight enemies in each room of the house. The game itself is based on the metaphor of a dark and abusive household where the children need to escape into their imaginations to avoid their abusive parent/guardian who is personified within the enemies in the game. 

Controls- Can be found inside the Help menu on the Title screen
